select new com.jshx.zyyl.entity.MaiMat(t.id, t.areaName, t.companyName, t.material) from MaiMat t where t.delFlag = 0
and t.deptId in (:deptCodes)
and t.id in (:ids)
and t.areaId = :areaId
and t.companyName like :companyName
and t.material like :material
and t.createUserID= :createUserId
and charindex(t.companyId,:companmyIds) >0
order by t.createTime desc
